pkgmetadata.longdescription: Model-Averaged Tail Area Wald (MATA-Wald) Confidence Interval // Calculates Model-Averaged Tail Area Wald (MATA-Wald) confidence intervals, which are constructed using single-model estimators and model weights. See Turek and Fletcher (2012) doi:10.1016/j.csda.2012.03.002 for details.
